venue_description: Flintfields Horse Park is northern Michigan’s premier equestrian venue. Located on 130 acres, the park offers sport, shopping and summer fun and provides services and amenities for horse enthusiasts while hosting various equine events and activities for both seasoned riders and beginnershttps://www.mapquest.com/us/michigan/flintfields-horse-park-462708038#:~:text=Flintfields%20Horse%20Park%20is%20a,to%20horse%20enthusiasts%20and%20competitorshttps://app.gopassage.com/venues/8654.

data-ess:
{
  "_meta": {
    "venue_uid": "tchs-venue",
    "city_uid": "williamsburg",
    "state_uid": "mi",
    "geo": {
      "lon": -85.4451951,
      "lat": 44.7804744,
      "placeid": "Ei42NTM1IEJhdGVzIFJkICMyYywgV2lsbGlhbXNidXJnLCBNSSA0OTY5MCwgVVNBIh4aHAoWChQKEgl_L-oCc9AfiBHjQl1DSLIxYBICMmM",
      "timezone": ""
    },
    "source": "geo context + known retail corridors along US-31 N, M-72, and Hammond/Three Mile near TVC (Cherry Capital Airport). Venue vendor row link used for on-grounds context.",
    "venue_links": {
      "essentials": "https://traversecityhorseshows.com/vendors/vendorrow/",
      "ref1": "",
      "ref2": ""
    },
    "disclaimer": "Check show-week hours and inventory. Drive times are estimates from Flintfields/US-31 gate with a truck or rig."
  },
  "curator_overview": "Fast, no-nonsense essentials near Flintfields so you can restock between trips from stabling. We prioritized big lots for easy trailer turns, curbside pickups, and equine-savvy suppliers on the US-31/M-72 loop east of Traverse City.",
  "curator_cta_text": "Tell me your closest gate or barn row and I’ll map a 40-minute supply loop that dodges US-31 bottlenecks.",
  "curator_keywords": [
    "Traverse City Horse Shows",
    "Flintfields Horse Park",
    "Williamsburg MI essentials",
    "grocery",
    "pharmacy",
    "feed",
    "tack",
    "bedding",
    "car rental",
    "golf cart rental",
    "US-31",
    "M-72"
  ],
  "curator_insider_phrases": [
    "warm-up ring",
    "jog strip",
    "vendor row",
    "stabling"
  ],
  "essentials_buckets": {
    "grocery": {
      "overview": "Full-line grocers with curbside and big lots—easy in/out for coolers, water flats, and barn snacks.",
      "items": [
        {
          "name": "Meijer – Acme",
          "formatted_address": "4900 M-72 E, Williamsburg/Acme, MI",
          "approx_drive_min": "8–12",
          "open_hours": "Early–late, curbside available",
          "parking": "Huge surface lot; trailer-friendly edges",
          "notes": "One-stop bulk water, ice, rider meals, basic camp supplies."
        },
        {
          "name": "Walmart Supercenter – Traverse City (US-31)",
          "formatted_address": "2640 Crossing Cir, Traverse City, MI",
          "approx_drive_min": "18–22",
          "open_hours": "Extended",
          "parking": "Very large lot with easy pull-through",
          "notes": "Budget bulk restock: coolers, snacks, tarps, bins."
        },
        {
          "name": "Costco Wholesale – Traverse City",
          "formatted_address": "125 E South Airport Rd, Traverse City, MI",
          "approx_drive_min": "22–28",
          "open_hours": "Warehouse hours",
          "parking": "Huge lot",
          "notes": "Case water, protein snacks, batteries—good team stock-up run."
        },
        {
          "name": "Tom’s Food Market – East Bay",
          "formatted_address": "738 Munson Ave, Traverse City, MI",
          "approx_drive_min": "16–20",
          "open_hours": "Grocery hours",
          "parking": "Plaza lot",
          "notes": "Solid deli for quick barn lunches; ice by the bag."
        }
      ]
    },
    "pharmacy": {
      "overview": "Chain pharmacies on US-31/M-72 with drive-thru—wraps, blister care, electrolytes, rider OTCs.",
      "items": [
        {
          "name": "Walgreens – Acme",
          "formatted_address": "559 E M-72, Williamsburg/Acme, MI",
          "approx_drive_min": "8–12",
          "open_hours": "Daytime–late; drive-thru",
          "parking": "Surface lot",
          "notes": "Fast OTC stop between rides; ice packs and tapes usually in stock."
        },
        {
          "name": "CVS Pharmacy – Traverse City (US-31)",
          "formatted_address": "421 S Division St area, Traverse City, MI",
          "approx_drive_min": "18–22",
          "open_hours": "Extended daytime/evening",
          "parking": "Plaza lot",
          "notes": "Quick grab for meds and sports tape en route to vendor row."
        },
        {
          "name": "Meijer Pharmacy – Acme (in-store)",
          "formatted_address": "4900 M-72 E, Williamsburg/Acme, MI",
          "approx_drive_min": "8–12",
          "open_hours": "Grocery pharmacy hours",
          "parking": "Large lot",
          "notes": "Handy if you’re already doing a grocery pickup slot."
        }
      ]
    },
    "feed_tack_bedding": {
      "overview": "Equine-savvy sources for shavings, pellets, buckets, fans, and last-minute tack. Call ahead for pallet loads and timing.",
      "items": [
        {
          "name": "Tractor Supply Co. – Traverse City (Hammond Rd)",
          "formatted_address": "2195 N US-31 S vicinity, Traverse City, MI",
          "approx_drive_min": "20–25",
          "open_hours": "Typically 8am–8pm",
          "parking": "Trailer-friendly; side load lane",
          "notes": "Shavings, pellets, muck tubs, hose nozzles; ask for forklift assist."
        },
        {
          "name": "Family Farm & Home – Traverse City",
          "formatted_address": "Farm/Home corridor near US-31, Traverse City, MI",
          "approx_drive_min": "20–26",
          "open_hours": "Retail hours",
          "parking": "Large lot",
          "notes": "Backup for bedding and barn hardware when TSC is light on stock."
        },
        {
          "name": "Cherryland Feed & Supply",
          "formatted_address": "Traverse City, MI (warehouse retail)",
          "approx_drive_min": "22–28",
          "open_hours": "Retail hours",
          "parking": "Warehouse lot",
          "notes": "Grain, supplements, buckets—call ahead for volume and load-out help."
        },
        {
          "name": "On-grounds Bedding Vendor (show weeks)",
          "formatted_address": "Delivery to stabling lanes",
          "approx_drive_min": "Delivered",
          "open_hours": "By arrangement via show office/vendor row",
          "parking": "N/A",
          "notes": "Confirm cut-off times with the office; schedule during ring drags to keep aisles clear."
        }
      ],
      "pro_tip": "Book shavings for a mid-morning drop—forklifts move fastest between course resets, not after the Grand Prix."
    },
    "car_rental": {
      "overview": "Airport counters have the best inventory for multi-week bookings; suburban branches work for quick swaps.",
      "items": [
        {
          "name": "Cherry Capital Airport (TVC) – Hertz/Avis/National/Alamo",
          "formatted_address": "727 Fly Don’t Drive Ave (airport campus), Traverse City, MI",
          "approx_drive_min": "25–30",
          "open_hours": "Airport hours",
          "parking": "Garage/terminal lots",
          "notes": "Reserve small SUV for coolers and trunks; verify additional driver rules for grooms."
        },
        {
          "name": "Enterprise Rent-A-Car – Traverse City (US-31 corridor)",
          "formatted_address": "Traverse City, MI",
          "approx_drive_min": "22–28",
          "open_hours": "Business hours; limited Sunday",
          "parking": "On-site lot",
          "notes": "Good for mid-week swaps; ask about after-hours key drop."
        }
      ]
    },
    "golf_cart_rental": {
      "overview": "Prefer delivery to barn rows; request rain enclosures and a utility bed for bedding and ice runs.",
      "items": [
        {
          "name": "Regional Golf Cart Rental (delivery service)",
          "formatted_address": "Grand Traverse area, MI",
          "approx_drive_min": "Delivered",
          "open_hours": "Business hours; weekend by arrangement",
          "parking": "N/A (drop-off at barn row)",
          "notes": "Share barn row and charger location; ask for extra key sets for grooms."
        },
        {
          "name": "On-grounds Cart Vendor (seasonal, see Vendor Row)",
          "formatted_address": "Flintfields Horse Park",
          "approx_drive_min": "On-site",
          "open_hours": "Show office/vendor row hours",
          "parking": "N/A",
          "notes": "Confirm insurance requirements and speed rules near the jog strip."
        }
      ],
      "pro_tip": "Reserve one week out for peak weeks. Align drop with ticketed schooling to avoid barn-aisle congestion."
    }
  }
}
prompt-hotels: [{"TASK":"Curate hotel options for Flintfields Horse Park (venue_uid=tchs-venue)","Location":"city: Williamsburg city_uid=williamsburg, state:MI state_uid=mi.","GEO context":"lat=44.7804744, lon=-85.44519509999999 placeid=Ei42NTM1IEJhdGVzIFJkICMyYywgV2lsbGlhbXNidXJnLCBNSSA0OTY5MCwgVVNBIh4aHAoWChQKEgl_L-oCc9AfiBHjQl1DSLIxYBICMmM.","Official venue link":"https://traversecityhorseshows.com/flintfields-horse-park/","Audience":"Competitive hunter/jumper riders on the A-circuit (trainers, grooms, show parents). Prioritize tight ring windows, early schooling, late features, and parking for trucks/trailers.","Tone":"Practical, insider, authoritative. Use real A-circuit phrasing (warm-up ring, jog strip, vendor row, stabling, drags, splits). No fluff.","Buckets":[{"label":"–$$$","description":"Practical/groom-friendly within ~20–25 min; easy surface lots; walkable food."},{"label":"$$$$","description":"Owner-trainer/boutique up to ~35 min; quiet, reliable service; valet/self-park clarity."}],"Must_have_amenities_any":["reliable Wi-Fi","late check-in","early coffee or breakfast","laundry access (in-house or nearby)","truck/trailer-friendly or large surface lot"],"Hard_excludes":["Motel 6","Red Roof Inn","Econo Lodge","Super 8","Rodeway Inn","weekly-rate motels","properties with persistent safety complaints"],"Safety emphasis":["well-lit parking","quiet rooms (away from nightlife)","walkable dining for grooms"],"Name_parsing":"If brand + locality (e.g., 'Hilton Garden Inn Ocala Downtown'), set hotel_name='Hilton Garden Inn', name2='Ocala Downtown'. If generic (e.g., 'Equus Inn Ocala'), set hotel_name='Equus Inn', name2='Ocala'.\",\"Chain_parsing\": \"If chain provided like 'Hilton (Hilton Garden Inn)', set chain='Hilton', chain2='Hilton Garden Inn'. Else chain='Independent', chain2='Independent'.","Amenity_normalization":"Return amenities as a semicolon-separated string OR array; prefer concise, rider-useful items (early breakfast, laundry, parking notes).","Safety_notes_style":"One sentence, concrete location/policy guidance (e.g., 'Use garage; avoid street parking with tack.').","Approx_drive_format":"Use ranges like '20–25 min'; reflect typical traffic on US-301/Largo/Bowie corridors.","Flagged budget motel chains to avoid":"Motel 6, Red Roof Inn, Econo Lodge, Super 8, Rodeway Inn.","Reference schema":"https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/hotel-curator_example.json","Duplicates":"Deduplicate near-identical listings; prefer the newest/most reliable page.","Minimum required JSON fields":"venue_uid, bucket, name, approx_drive, chain, amenities, safety_notes, url"}]

Use authentic insider phrasing (warm-up ring, jog strip, vendor row, stabling).","Tone":"upbeat, practical, authoritative.","Official venue link":"https://traversecityhorseshows.com/flintfields-horse-park/","Constraints":null,"Reference schema":"https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/section_profile_example.json","Minimum required JSON fields":"section_uid, section_type, section_title, section_overview, section_keywords, section_cta_text, section_img, section_img_alt, section_link, section_meta_description, section_open_graph_title, section_open_graph_description, section_search_title, section_search_description, section_spotlight"}]
data-section:
{
  "section_uid": "tchs-venue-sec",
  "section_type": "section_profile",
  "section_title": "Flintfields Horse Park — Venue Profile",
  "section_overview": "Traverse City Horse Shows at Flintfields delivers big-ring atmosphere with polished management and a smooth barn-to-in-gate flow. Expect roomy all-weather warm-ups, efficient ingates, and a clearly marked jog strip near the FEI side. Vendor row clusters around the main plaza for quick fixes and caffeine between trips. Stabling is organized and walkable; plan your hack routes to dodge golf-cart pinch points and give yourself a few extra minutes before big eqs, derbies, and Grand Prix classes.",
  "section_keywords": [
    "Flintfields Horse Park",
    "Traverse City Horse Shows",
    "Williamsburg MI",
    "Traverse City",
    "Great Lakes",
    "hunter jumper",
    "equitation",
    "derbies",
    "Grand Prix",
    "warm-up ring",
    "jog strip",
    "vendor row",
    "stabling",
    "A-circuit"
  ],
  "section_cta_text": "Plan your week at Flintfields",
  "section_img": "https://traversecityhorseshows.com/wp-content/uploads/flintfields-horse-park-grounds.jpg",
  "section_img_alt": "Flintfields Horse Park main rings, warm-up arenas, and stabling layout",
  "section_link": "https://traversecityhorseshows.com/flintfields-horse-park/",
  "section_meta_description": "Insider venue profile for Flintfields Horse Park in Williamsburg, MI—warm-up flow, jog strip tips, vendor row, and stabling guidance for A-circuit hunter/jumper riders.",
  "section_open_graph_title": "Flintfields Horse Park — Venue Guide for A-Circuit Riders",
  "section_open_graph_description": "Practical notes on warm-up rings, the jog strip, vendor row, and stabling so you can move efficiently between trips at Traverse City Horse Shows.",
  "section_search_title": "Flintfields Horse Park Venue Profile",
  "section_search_description": "Authoritative, rider-focused overview of Flintfields: warm-up, jog strip, vendor row, stabling, and show-day logistics for hunters, jumpers, and equitation.",
  "section_spotlight": {
    "title": "Quick Hits for Show Week",
    "bullets": [
      "Warm-up: left-to-left; call your lines early. Flat off-peak—traffic stacks up ahead of eq and derby orders.",
      "Ring flow: add 5–8 minutes from stabling to the main rings at peak; hand-walk hacks on outer lanes to avoid golf-cart bottlenecks.",
      "Jog strip: arrive polished and early; number visible; keep hoof oil and a towel in your ring bag for last-second touch-ups.",
      "Vendor row: tack repair, studs, spur straps, and coffee near the plaza—call ahead for quick pick-ups between trips.",
      "Stabling: aisles stay active—trunks flush, fans secured, hoses coiled; use designated lunging and hand-grazing areas only.",
      "Footing & drags: modern all-weather; check posted drag intervals and confirm schooling blocks with the ingate before you tack up.",
      "Weather watch: mornings can be cool with a lake breeze—pack layers and consider conservative stud choices after overnight moisture.",
      "Logistics: trailer parking is separate; coordinate feed/ice runs early. Rideshare is limited—golf cart or bike saves time.",
      "Pro tip: keep a mini tool kit in the ring bag—hole punch, zip ties, electrical tape—for quick fixes on vendor row or at the warm-up."
    ]
  }
}

TASK: Curate venue links for [{"venue_official_name":"Flintfields Horse Park","state_uid":["recDVHqTuaL3b8Qn4"],"venue_official_link":"https://traversecityhorseshows.com/flintfields-horse-park/","city_uid":["recCmsrkAmFYvNLvp"],"placeId":"Ei42NTM1IEJhdGVzIFJkICMyYywgV2lsbGlhbXNidXJnLCBNSSA0OTY5MCwgVVNBIh4aHAoWChQKEgl_L-oCc9AfiBHjQl1DSLIxYBICMmM","formatted_addressv3":"6535 Bates Rd, Williamsburg, MI 49690, USA","venue_recordId":"recQGSCFCptMqRRZD"}] (venue_uid=[{"venue_official_name":"Flintfields Horse Park","state_uid":["recDVHqTuaL3b8Qn4"],"venue_official_link":"https://traversecityhorseshows.com/flintfields-horse-park/","city_uid":["recCmsrkAmFYvNLvp"],"placeId":"Ei42NTM1IEJhdGVzIFJkICMyYywgV2lsbGlhbXNidXJnLCBNSSA0OTY5MCwgVVNBIh4aHAoWChQKEgl_L-oCc9AfiBHjQl1DSLIxYBICMmM","formatted_addressv3":"6535 Bates Rd, Williamsburg, MI 49690, USA","venue_recordId":"recQGSCFCptMqRRZD"}]), Flintfields Horse Park represents an Equestrian Venue located near , Location: 6535 Bates Rd, Williamsburg, MI 49690, USA, GEO context: lat=44.7804744, lon=-85.44519509999999 placeid=Ei42NTM1IEJhdGVzIFJkICMyYywgV2lsbGlhbXNidXJnLCBNSSA0OTY5MCwgVVNBIh4aHAoWChQKEgl_L-oCc9AfiBHjQl1DSLIxYBICMmM., ### Venue Link Field Definitions - venue_official_link → Canonical homepage for the venue. - venue_link_stay → On-site or affiliated lodging (hotels, resorts, rentals). - venue_link_dine → Venue-hosted or recommended dining/restaurants. - venue_link_locale → “Things to do” / local attractions content. - venue_link_events → Events schedule page (official calendar of shows). - venue_link_rvparks → Dedicated RV or campground info. - venue_link_vendors → Vendor Row / exhibitor marketplace. - venue_link_essentials → Practical services: groceries, pharmacy, tack. - venue_link_riders → Rider services: entries, scratches, registration info. - venue_link_barn → Barn & stabling: stalls, hay, bedding, feed services. - venue_link_services → On-site professional services: braiding, vet, farrier. - venue_link_results → Competition results, standings, order of go. - venue_link_carts → Golf cart rentals or mobility vehicles. - venue_link_cars → Car rental or transportation services., Goal: For each populated link, extract canonical content and return JSON.
Reference schema: https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/venue-link-curator_example_v2.json, Minimum required JSON fields per link:
venue_uid, category, field, url, canonical_title, meta_description, keywords, notes
